verbose_text: The engineered chimeric opsin variant, which contained point mutated glutamic acid (E) to threonine (T) at 122 and 162 (C1V1 E122T / E162T; C1V1 ET-ET), was used to optically activate hfNSCs by light exposure at 539 nm XREF_BIBR.
evidence: opsin variant, which contained point-mutated glutamic acid (E) to threonine (T) at 122 and 162 (C1V1 E122T/E162T; C1V1 ET-ET), was used to optically activate hfNSCs
